figure_1: VTE events were captured using a rigorously validated algorithm and based on International Classification of Diseases, Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM) and International Statistical Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM) codes, anticoagulant medications, and natural language processing radiology reports in inpatient and outpatient encounters. Dots denote means and error bars denote 95% CIs.
